text: The Girl on a Motorcycle (French: La motocyclette) is a 1968 British French erotic romantic drama movie. It was directed by Jack Cardiff. It stars Marianne Faithfull, Alain Delon, Roger Mutton, Marius Goring, Catherine Jourdan, Jacques Marin and Andr√© Maranne. ==Other websites== * Category:1968 romantic drama movies Category:1960s erotic movies Category:British romantic drama movies Category:French romance movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Jack Cardiff Category:Movies set in France Category:Movies set in Germany
